+#include "export.h"
+
+typedef struct {
+    double x;
+    double y;
+} DoublePoint;
+
+EXPORT DoublePoint unit() {
+    DoublePoint result = { 1, 0 };
+    return result;
+}
+
+EXPORT void unit_ptr(DoublePoint* out) {
+  *out = unit();
+}
